alert.note: Alert for White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 25 at 5:08AM MST until November 25 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING ABOVE 7500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow showers will continue through this morning, tapering off by early afternoon. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 5 inches, with the heavier amounts along west and northwest facing slopes above 8000 feet. Southwest to west winds gusting up to 30 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 7500 feet near McNary, Greer, Nutrioso and Alpine. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Snow forecast through 11 AM Today: Alpine 0 to 1 inches Pinetop-Lkside 0 to 1 inches Show Low 0 to 1 inches
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
